Class RandomRobot

java.lang.Object
  Robot
      RandomRobot
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRobot
public class RandomRobot
extends Robot

This class is a RandomRobot that inherits from the Robot class. It has all the same instance data and methods as any other Robot, but it implements the abstract method calculateNext() in a unique manner which entails random behavior.

Author:
Yifan Ge, Kevin Thomas, Davis Gallinghouse

Method Detail

calculateNext

public void calculateNext()
Description copied from class: Robot
Calculates the next location and next direction of the robot and updates the member data. To move the robot in some way, the code inside calculateNext() should update the nextLocation and nextDirection instance fields. Called by step method.

Specified by:
calculateNext in class Robot
